creator: ps@nomensa.com
text:
Select some text, right click 'Create link'

popup with following error appears

<error>
 The requested document '/kupupopups/link.html' with document-id
'/kupupopups/link' does not exist.
</error>

creator: bobharner@gmail.com
text:
On a build from a week ago, this failed for me as described.  Very probably a
duplicate of bug 32764 based on the symptom.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 32764 ***
